title: Eddie Tried A Citizen’s Arrest + Bobby’s Mailbag: Letting Family Members Spank Your Kids + Lunchbox Prank Calls A Bank
itunes:title: Eddie Tried A Citizen’s Arrest + Bobby’s Mailbag: Letting Family Members Spank Your Kids + Lunchbox Prank Calls A Bank
description:
Eddie says he saw a hit and run jumped into action. A listener has a question about if it’s okay to let other family members spank your kids. Plus, Lunchbox called a bank to tell them he wants a secret account to hide money from his wife!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
